recommendations.title: Implement Multi-Region and Zone Redundancy Across All Critical Azure Services
recommendations.description: Deploy AKS clusters, Cosmos DB, Redis, SQL Database, and Service Bus in multiple regions and/or enable zone redundancy. Configure traffic management using Azure Front Door or Traffic Manager and geo-disaster recovery features to ensure business continuity during regional outages.

recommendations.title: Establish Automated Backup, Disaster Recovery, and Failover Procedures
recommendations.description: Enable Azure Backup for all databases and stateful services and configure automated failover and restore processes. Set up DR runbooks and regularly conduct DR drills to validate your RTO/RPO targets. Document and review these plans quarterly.

recommendations.title: Enforce Secrets Management and Identity Isolation Using Azure Key Vault and Workload ID
recommendations.description: Replace Kubernetes secrets and environment variable credentials with centralized secrets management using Azure Key Vault. Adopt Microsoft Entra Workload ID for service identity delegation within AKS. Institute proper RBAC policies at both AKS and Azure platform levels.

recommendations.title: Introduce Chaos Engineering and Automated Resilience/Fault Injection Testing
recommendations.description: Integrate Azure Chaos Studio or equivalent tools for controlled fault injection and resilience validation. Develop regular schedules for chaos experiments, and use learnings to iteratively improve architecture and incident response runbooks.

recommendations.title: Configure Cluster Autoscaler and Apply Resource Quotas, Limits, and Pod Disruption Budgets
recommendations.description: Enable AKS Cluster Autoscaler and tune node pool settings for adaptive scaling. Define resource limits/requests for all containers, set namespace-level quotas, configure Pod Disruption Budgets and security policies to minimize unexpected downtime and improve resilience.

recommendations.title: Strengthen Monitoring and Distributed Tracing Across All Microservices
recommendations.description: Ensure Azure Monitor and Application Insights are enabled for all microservices. Integrate distributed tracing (OpenTelemetry or Azure Monitor Application Map) to diagnose issues across system boundaries. Expand observable health probes (including startup probes), and build custom dashboards to track SLOs, SLIs, and error budgets.

recommendations.title: Eliminate Synchronous Microservice Dependencies and Enable Event-Driven Architecture
recommendations.description: Refactor inter-service communications to use asynchronous messaging (Service Bus topics, events) where appropriate. Introduce retry policies, circuit breakers, and fallback logic to improve resilience against transient failures.

recommendations.title: Formalize Reliability Design and Map All User/System Flows to Business Impact and Reliability Targets
recommendations.description: Create comprehensive documentation of all user/system flows, rate criticality, and establish corresponding reliability targets (SLO, SLI, RTO/RPO). Map flows to business processes and dependencies to guide resilience investments.

recommendations.title: Enable Automated Image Vulnerability Scanning and Version Pinning in CI/CD
recommendations.description: Integrate continuous image scanning in your build pipelines and enforce base image version pinning. Use Microsoft Defender for Containers to minimize exposure to supply chain attacks.

recommendations.title: Define architecture principles
recommendations.description: Document simplicity and dependency minimization principles.

recommendations.title: Catalog critical flows
recommendations.description: Create inventory with owners, criticality, and SLIs.

recommendations.title: Conduct structured FMA
recommendations.description: Enumerate components, failure modes, likelihood and impact.

recommendations.title: Define SLOs & Error Budgets
recommendations.description: Set availability, latency, and recovery targets per critical flow.

recommendations.title: Implement circuit breaker
recommendations.description: Add circuit breaker and retry with backoff for external dependencies.

recommendations.title: Start chaos experiments
recommendations.description: Inject latency and dependency faults in non-prod.

recommendations.title: Create disaster recovery runbook
recommendations.description: Define triggers, roles, failover and failback process.

recommendations.title: Add synthetic checks & correlation IDs
recommendations.description: Implement geo-probes and trace correlation for end-to-end visibility.

gaps.label: Single region deployment
gaps.detail: Workload deployed in only one Azure region; increases blast radius for regional failures.

gaps.label: No availability zones configured
gaps.detail: Zone redundancy disabled or not mentioned for critical compute tier.

gaps.label: No backup or disaster recovery configuration
gaps.detail: Backups, DR plan, or failover strategy absent.

gaps.label: No autoscale configured
gaps.detail: Autoscaling rules missing; potential performance degradation under variable load.

gaps.label: No health probes or checks
gaps.detail: Health endpoints or probe configuration absent; impairs self-healing.

gaps.label: External dependency without fallback
gaps.detail: Critical external services (e.g., Bing) lack fallback or degraded mode.

gaps.label: Missing resilience patterns
gaps.detail: Circuit breaker or retry patterns not implemented for dependencies.

gaps.label: Basic service tier with limited SLA
gaps.detail: Using low-tier SKU (e.g., Basic B1) reduces availability guarantees.

gaps.label: Public network access without isolation
gaps.detail: Resources exposed publicly; no VNet/private endpoints configured.

gaps.label: No WAF or DDoS protection
gaps.detail: Missing edge protection measures for web workloads.

gaps.label: Limited monitoring and observability
gaps.detail: Only basic Application Insights; lack of distributed tracing or synthetic checks.
